name: Five Nights at Paint
description:
!!! Fullscreen mode highly recommended !!!

Close and open doors, monitor cameras, watch out for scary animatronics and question your existence as the night guard of a really sketchy pizzeria.

Scary animatronics include: Freddy, Owlca, Joe (?), and Amogus

1 player                   

Use a mouse of some kind to play

Feedback is very much appreciated! 

Features a difficult mode which makes the game physically darker.

This game works mostly like the actual game, I used the following sources for information: 

-- https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1438217374

-- https://imgur.com/a/xe01I

--
